author: craigmcc
msg: Use the correct manifest constants for index and nesting delimiter access.

author: husted
msg: Submitted by Ted Husted. Add isClosed() functionality to GenericConnection. Update to GenericDataSource getConnection to support GenericConnection isClosed. Add SQL Exception throw to GenericDataSource to unimplemented getConnection(username,password) signature.

author: craigmcc
msg: Undeprecate BeanUtils.getArrayProperty() - it actually works correctly for
array properties of primitives other than Strings.  Make it work correctly
for Collections of non-Strings as well.
Add a unit test for the <html:multibox> tag.  Nested setters still do not
work, but now we can get all of them in one fell swoop.

author: craigmcc
msg: Clean up the use of deprecated BeanUtils methods, and remove unneeded
imports of BeanUtils in classes that do not use it.
TODO: MultiboxTag still uses BeanUtils.getArrayProperty -- I need to write
a unit test page to prove that it works after I update this logic.

author: craigmcc
msg: Comment out the indexed property setter tests -- they cause problems with
the current BeanUtils.  The nested setters don't work yet, either, but
